metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10945 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The mg_handle_cgi function in mongoose.c in Mongoose 6.11 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash, or NULL pointer dereference) via an HTTP request, related to the mbuf_insert function.

criterions.comment: smplayer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
